trans-unit.source: Provides information about a user's capabilities to view and modify personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Gir informasjon om egenskapene til en bruker til å vise og endre personlige data.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: At various points in the life cycle of a Web Parts application, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> object needs to check the capabilities of the current user to determine what personalization data the user can view and modify.
trans-unit.target: På ulike tidspunkter i livssyklusen for et program for webdeler i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>må kontrollere funksjoner for gjeldende bruker for å finne ut hvilke personlige data brukeren kan vise og endre.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: When this need arises, the personalization object checks instances of the WebPartUserCapability class.
trans-unit.target: Når denne behov, kontrollerer personlige data-objekt forekomster av klassen WebPartUserCapability.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts personalization feature defines two user capabilities, each of which is represented by a WebPartUserCapability object.
trans-unit.target: Funksjonen webdeler tilpassing definerer to bruker funksjonalitet som representeres av et WebPartUserCapability-objekt.

trans-unit.source: Both of these objects have corresponding verbs that can be used to specify user capabilities within the `<authorization>` section of a Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: Begge disse objektene har tilsvarende verb som kan brukes til å angi bruker-funksjonalitet i den `<authorization>` delen i Web.config-filen.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [authorization Element for personalization for webParts (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d190d4ff-1445-4ee1-88eb-9737c7aa1434).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [godkjenning elementet for tilpassing webdeler (ASP.NET innstillingsskjemaet)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d190d4ff-1445-4ee1-88eb-9737c7aa1434).

trans-unit.source: The different user capabilities are shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Annen bruker funksjoner vises i følgende tabell.

trans-unit.source: |User capability|Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |`modifyState`|Indicates that the current user can save personalization data to the data store.
trans-unit.target: | Bruker funksjonen | Beskrivelse | |---------------------|-----------------| | `modifyState`| Angir at gjeldende bruker kan lagre personlige data til datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability> field on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> object.| |`enterSharedScope`|Indicates that the current user can enter Shared personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: Tilgang til via <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability>-feltet for et objekt som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>. | | `enterSharedScope`| Angir at gjeldende bruker kan registrere delte område.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: Accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.EnterSharedScopeUserCapability> field on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> object.| The WebPartUserCapability class has one public property.
trans-unit.target: Tilgang til via <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.EnterSharedScopeUserCapability>-feltet for et objekt som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>. | Klassen WebPartUserCapability har ett felles egenskap.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.EnterSharedScopeUserCapability>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name%2A> property indicates the name of the class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name%2A>Egenskapen angir navnet på klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartUserCapability class also has two exposed methods.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WebPartUserCapability har også eksponerte metodene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Equals%2A> method allows two user capability objects to be compared.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Equals%2A>metoden kan to bruker capability objektene som skal sammenlignes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: The objects are considered equal if they have the same name.
trans-unit.target: Objektene regnes lik hvis de har samme navn.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.GetHashCode%2A> method generates a hash code based on the name of the WebPartUserCapability object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.GetHashCode%2A>metoden genererer en hash-kode som er basert på navnet på objektet WebPartUserCapability.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.GetHashCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av klassen.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a name for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder et navn for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: name is or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: nameer eller en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref> object, or has the same <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name*> value.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om det angitte objektet er lik gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref> objekt, eller har samme <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name*>verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>skal sammenlignes med gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: if o is equal to the current or has the same value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis o er lik gjeldende eller har samme verdi; ellers .

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name*> property.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer hashkoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability.Name*>

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: En 32-biters heltall med fortegn hash-kode.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string value identifying the class.
trans-unit.target: Henter en strengverdi som identifiserer klassen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that identifies the class.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som identifiserer klassen.</xref:System.String>
